mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_source_config (ID, DATA_SOURCE_KEY, URL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, DRIVER_CLASS_NAME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataSourceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update data_source_config set DATA_SOURCE_KEY = #{dataSourceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_CLASS_NAME = #{driverClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, DATA_SOURCE_KEY, URL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, DRIVER_CLASS_NAME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME from data_source_config where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, DATA_SOURCE_KEY, URL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, DRIVER_CLASS_NAME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME from data_source_config
